de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.result.fusion.areal.geocoding

Class PolygonFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.result.fusion.areal.geocoding.PolygonFileReader

  • public class PolygonFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Temporal Class for reading in .poly files. Has to be removed in case of applying a geocoding api. Dirty version but works :)

    Orginal code by Brett Henderson from Open Street Map project.
    Since:
    24.02.2014
    Author:
    Sebastian Schulz

      • loadSectionPolygon

        private GeoArea loadSectionPolygon(java.io.BufferedReader bufferedReader)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   PolygonReadingException
        Loads an individual polygon from the polygon file.
        Parameters:
        bufferedReader - The reader connected to the polygon file placed at the first record of a polygon section.
        Returns:
        An area representing the section polygon.
        Throws:
        PolygonReadingException
        java.io.IOException

      • parseCoordinates

        private double[] parseCoordinates(java.lang.String coordinateLine)
                           throws PolygonReadingException
        Parses a coordinate line into its constituent double precision coordinates.
        Parameters:
        coordinateLine - The raw file line.
        Returns:
        A pair of coordinate values, first is longitude, second is latitude.
        Throws:
        PolygonReadingException

      • getPolygonName

        public java.lang.String getPolygonName()
        This method must only be called after loadPolygon().
        Returns:
        The name of the polygon as stated in the file-header.
